name: Pogo Betty
description:
POGO BETTY

- CONTROLS -

A / D - Move left and right

SPACE - Jump (Double tap to flip)

- INFORMATION -

A game by NPJarcade, written in 4 days using only 4 colours for GBJAM 5.

- Pogo to the stars and back!

- Collect stars to enter FREESTYLE mode!

- Flip for extra points!

- Watch out for UFOs!

- UPDATES & BUG FIXES -

14.10.2016 Update

- Overall game difficulty updated to make things a bit easier

- Extra sound effects added

- Fixed a bug where multiple sounds would play for a single jump

- CREDITS -

Follow me on Twitter @NPJarcade

Programming, artwork and graphics by NPJarcade, UK, 2016.

Audio randomly generated using ChipTone - http://sfbgames.com/chiptone
